name: Bob loves food
description:
Play as Bob, a happy blob who eats a lot. Bob will get bigger and bigger but beware! His controls will change at each stage !

How to play ? 

 

Check the controls panel in the top right corner ! You will be able to see your chaotic keys to control bob and your score. 

GameJam

This project was entirely made in 3 days for the MiniJam#100 with the theme "Overload" and the limitation "Chaos is everything".

Authors 
  • Zaksley - Developper 
  • Drenaya - Pixel art 
 Credits
  • Special thanks to Antoine Gaudy, "Godo" for coming up with the idea of changing the controls. 
  • Onycs - Shine (Music)
